name: Fort Collins Recycling Center
description: City of Fort Collins Recycling Drop-off Center
materials: Plastic #1 (PETE); Plastic #2 (HDPE); Plastic #2 (Color HDPE); Aerosol Spray Cans; Aluminum Cans; Glass (Blue); Glass (Brown); Brown Paper Bags; Cardboard; Catalogs; Chipboard; Glass (Clear); Computer Paper; Gift Boxes; Glass (Green); Greeting Cards; Magazines; Paper (Mixed); Newspapers; Paperboard; Phone books; Tin or Steel Cans; Office Paper; Bags & Belts; Books (Reuse); CD/DVD/Blu-ray/UHD discs; Clothing; Purses, Handbags, & Totes; Shoes; Textiles
notes: This site is located at Riverside and Prospect, just north of the Rivendell School.  Open dawn to dusk. Please remove lids from containers and rinse them thoroughly.  Paper labels can stay on containers, but remove metallic or plastic labels.  This site does not accept plate or window glass, drinking glasses, dishes, Pyrex, light bulbs, mirrors, ceramics, or containers that contained hazardous materials.
